function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low community-level control of vector spread","Impact":"Nearly the entire population getting infected","Mitigation":"Increase patch-level vector control by authorities","Technologies":"Vector control measures like insecticide spraying","People":"Entire population at risk","Owner":"Authorities and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of personal protection impact on outbreak size","Impact":"Small differences in the final proportion infected","Mitigation":"Increase concern for being bitten and implement personal protection measures","Technologies":"Personal protection measures like mosquito nets and repellents","People":"Population at risk","Owner":"Government health agencies and individuals"}]}
